item.title: auto nandroid backup
item.description:
How to automate nandroid backups with TWRP and Tasker on a rooted Android device.

This guide assumes you have a rooted Android device with TWRP recovery flashed and Tasker installed. Also note that this won’t work as intended with encrypted devices.

  1. Open Tasker and create a new task

Optional - Move backup to PC with cron task
